price: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, ẹ ṣe sùúrù, ẹ pàrọwà sùúrù, ẹ ṣọ́ bodè ìlú yín (láti lè dènà àwọn ọmọ-ogun ọ̀tá ẹ̀sìn). Kí ẹ sì bẹ̀rù Allāhu nítorí kí ẹ lè jèrè.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱصۡبِرُواْ وَصَابِرُواْ وَرَابِطُواْ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū iṣ'birū waṣābirū warābiṭū wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
